analyzed: ▁dassanena pa hā tabb ahetu k aduk a

original: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā. Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko
Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
